title: Action Legend John Woo Relives His Hong Kong Days, as Hard-to-See ‘Hard Boiled’ and ‘The Killer’ Get Another Shot With Audiences
summary: We take it for granted today, but John Woo has one of the most recognizable visual styles of any living filmmaker.
